trans-unit.source: Change the size of a pool
trans-unit.target: Change the size of a pool

trans-unit.source: Changes the number of compute nodes that are assigned to a pool.
trans-unit.target: Changes the number of compute nodes that are assigned to a pool.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: POST
trans-unit.target: POST

trans-unit.source: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that you want to resize.
trans-unit.target: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that you want to resize.

trans-unit.source: The following example requests that the pool be resized to 5 nodes, terminating any excess tasks without re queuing them:
trans-unit.target: The following example requests that the pool be resized to 5 nodes, terminating any excess tasks without re queuing them:

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: Required

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: Type

trans-unit.source: Notes
trans-unit.target: Notes

trans-unit.source: resizeTimeout
trans-unit.target: resizeTimeout

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: Time
trans-unit.target: Time

trans-unit.source: Specifies the timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool or removal of compute nodes from the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool or removal of compute nodes from the pool.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: The default value is 10 minutes.

trans-unit.source: The minimum value is 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: The minimum value is 5 minutes.

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value less than 5 minutes, the Batch service returns a Bad Request (400).
trans-unit.target: If you specify a value less than 5 minutes, the Batch service returns a Bad Request (400).

trans-unit.source: nodeDeallocationOption
trans-unit.target: nodeDeallocationOption

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Specifies when nodes may be removed from the pool, if the pool size is decreasing.
trans-unit.target: Specifies when nodes may be removed from the pool, if the pool size is decreasing.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>requeue</languageKeyword> – Terminate running tasks and requeue them.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>requeue</languageKeyword> – Terminate running tasks and requeue them.

trans-unit.source: The tasks will run again when the job is enabled.
trans-unit.target: The tasks will run again when the job is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Remove nodes as soon as tasks have been terminated.
trans-unit.target: Remove nodes as soon as tasks have been terminated.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>terminate</languageKeyword> – Terminate running tasks.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>terminate</languageKeyword> – Terminate running tasks.

trans-unit.source: The tasks will not run again.
trans-unit.target: The tasks will not run again.

trans-unit.source: Remove nodes as soon as tasks have been terminated.
trans-unit.target: Remove nodes as soon as tasks have been terminated.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>taskcompletion</languageKeyword> – Allow currently running tasks to complete.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>taskcompletion</languageKeyword> – Allow currently running tasks to complete.

trans-unit.source: Schedule no new tasks while waiting.
trans-unit.target: Schedule no new tasks while waiting.

trans-unit.source: Remove nodes when all tasks have completed.
trans-unit.target: Remove nodes when all tasks have completed.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>Retaineddata</languageKeyword> - Allow currently running tasks to complete, then wait for all task data retention periods to expire.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>Retaineddata</languageKeyword> - Allow currently running tasks to complete, then wait for all task data retention periods to expire.

trans-unit.source: Schedule no new tasks while waiting.
trans-unit.target: Schedule no new tasks while waiting.

trans-unit.source: Remove nodes when all task retention periods have expired.
trans-unit.target: Remove nodes when all task retention periods have expired.

trans-unit.source: The default value is requeue.
trans-unit.target: The default value is requeue.

trans-unit.source: targetDedicated
trans-unit.target: targetDedicated

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: Int32
trans-unit.target: Int32

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of compute nodes that should be in the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of compute nodes that should be in the pool.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: Status code: 202.
trans-unit.target: Status code: 202.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: You can only resize a pool when its allocationState is steady.
trans-unit.target: You can only resize a pool when its allocationState is steady.

trans-unit.source: If the pool is already resizing, the request fails with status code 409 (Conflict).
trans-unit.target: If the pool is already resizing, the request fails with status code 409 (Conflict).

trans-unit.source: When you resize a pool, the pool’s allocationState changes from steady to resizing.
trans-unit.target: When you resize a pool, the pool’s allocationState changes from steady to resizing.

trans-unit.source: You cannot resize pools which are configured for automatic scaling (that is, the enableAutoScale property of the pool is true).
trans-unit.target: You cannot resize pools which are configured for automatic scaling (that is, the enableAutoScale property of the pool is true).

trans-unit.source: If you try to do this, the Batch service returns an error 409 (Conflict).
trans-unit.target: If you try to do this, the Batch service returns an error 409 (Conflict).

trans-unit.source: If you resize a pool downwards, the Batch service chooses which nodes to remove.
trans-unit.target: If you resize a pool downwards, the Batch service chooses which nodes to remove.

trans-unit.source: To remove specific nodes, use <link xlink:href="eb33e899-ba5b-409d-a565-7a924572ffa7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Remove compute nodes from a pool</link>.
trans-unit.target: To remove specific nodes, use <link xlink:href="eb33e899-ba5b-409d-a565-7a924572ffa7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Remove compute nodes from a pool</link>.
